sentences.english: In three more my sister would want to go.
sentences.chinese: 再过三年，妹妹也要上了。

sentences.english: Polina also didn’t share the information with her sister.
sentences.chinese: 波琳娜也没有把这件事告诉她的妹妹。

sentences.english: It was in the zoo that Xiao Yang met your sister.
sentences.chinese: 小杨昨天是在动物园碰到你妹妹的。

sentences.english: That teacher told my sister , don't learn much more English!
sentences.chinese: 记住不要再像我妹妹一样被一些居心叵测的人利用。

sentences.english: He helped his sister out of the carriage.
I wanted mother's present to be secret, but my sister let the cat out of the bag.
sentences.chinese: 给母亲的礼物我原想保密的，可是妹妹却露了马脚。

sentences.english: The students feared any siblings would steal their parents exclusive love, Wang said.
sentences.chinese: 这些学生担心弟弟妹妹会分走自己独享的父母宠爱。

sentences.english: Not wishing to disturb his baby sister, he tiptoed into the room.
sentences.chinese: 他不想打扰他的小妹妹，蹑手蹑脚地走进了屋里。

sentences.english: Today, my 8 year old little sister said "f you" to my mom.
sentences.chinese: 今天，我8岁的妹妹对我妈说法克鱿。

sentences.english: Once upon a time an emperor had a beautiful young sister.
sentences.chinese: 从前有个国王，他有个很漂亮的妹妹。

sentences.english: Both my parents are dead and I rarely see my two sisters.
sentences.chinese: 我的爸妈都死了，我很少见到我的两个妹妹。

sentences.english: I'm afraid my sister married a real wimp.
sentences.chinese: 我看我的妹妹大概是嫁了一个真正的软骨头。

sentences.english: Candy and his sister are visiting the zoo.
sentences.chinese: 肯迪和他妹妹正在游览动物园。

sentences.english: His 14-year-old sister, also from Thai Binh Province.
sentences.chinese: 他的14岁妹妹，也来自太平省。

sentences.english: Come on now, sister. I was only a little girl.
sentences.chinese: 别逗了，妹妹，那时我只是个小丫头。

sentences.english: Will's sister, Joan, opened the door, and then Will came running down the stairs.
sentences.chinese: 威尔的妹妹琼为我开了门，接着就见威尔跑下楼梯。

definition: younger female cousin via female line
older male cousin via female line
older female cousin via female line
